    DbPro. Professional database query and update tool.

      • queryFirst

        public <T> T queryFirst(java.lang.String sql,
                        java.lang.Object... paras)
        Execute sql query and return the first result. I recommend add "limit 1" in your sql.
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        Object[] if your sql has select more than one column, and it return Object if your sql has select only one column.

      • queryFirst

        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement
        関連項目:
        queryFirst(String, Object...)

      • queryColumn

        public <T> T queryColumn(java.lang.String sql,
                         java.lang.Object... paras)
        Execute sql query just return one column.
        型パラメータ:
        T - the type of the column that in your sql's select statement
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        List

      • update

        public int update(java.lang.String sql,
                  java.lang.Object... paras)
        Execute update, insert or delete sql statement.
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        either the row count for INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, or 0 for SQL statements that return nothing

        public Record findFirst(java.lang.String sql,

        Find first record. I recommend add "limit 1" in your sql.
        パラメータ:
        sql - an SQL statement that may contain one or more '?' IN parameter placeholders
        paras - the parameters of sql
        戻り値:
        the Record object

      • findById

        public Record findById(java.lang.String tableName,
                       java.lang.Object idValue)
        Find record by id with default primary key. 
         Example:
 Record user = DbPro.use().findById("user", 15);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        idValue - the id value of the record

      • findById

        public Record findById(java.lang.String tableName,
                       java.lang.String primaryKey,
                       java.lang.Object... idValue)
        Find record by id. 
         Example:
 Record user = DbPro.use().findById("user", "user_id", 123);
 Record userRole = DbPro.use().findById("user_role", "user_id, role_id", 123, 456);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        idValue - the id value of the record, it can be composite id values

      • deleteById

        public boolean deleteById(java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.Object idValue)
        Delete record by id with default primary key. 
         Example:
 DbPro.use().deleteById("user", 15);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        idValue - the id value of the record
        戻り値:
        true if delete succeed otherwise false

      • deleteById

        public boolean deleteById(java.lang.String tableName,
                          java.lang.String primaryKey,
                          java.lang.Object... idValue)
        Delete record by id. 
         Example:
 DbPro.use().deleteById("user", "user_id", 15);
 DbPro.use().deleteById("user_role", "user_id, role_id", 123, 456);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        idValue - the id value of the record, it can be composite id values
        戻り値:
        true if delete succeed otherwise false

      • delete

        public boolean delete(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String primaryKey,
                      Record record)
        Delete record. 
         Example:
 boolean succeed = DbPro.use().delete("user", "id", user);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        record - the record
        戻り値:
        true if delete succeed otherwise false

      • save

        public boolean save(java.lang.String tableName,
                    java.lang.String primaryKey,
                    Record record)
        Save record. 
         Example:
 Record userRole = new Record().set("user_id", 123).set("role_id", 456);
 DbPro.use().save("user_role", "user_id, role_id", userRole);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the table
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        record - the record will be saved
        true - if save succeed otherwise false

      • save

        public boolean save(java.lang.String tableName,
                    Record record)
        関連項目:
        save(String, String, Record)

      • update

        public boolean update(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String primaryKey,
                      Record record)
        Update Record. 
         Example:
 DbPro.use().update("user_role", "user_id, role_id", record);
        パラメータ:
        tableName - the table name of the Record save to
        primaryKey - the primary key of the table, composite primary key is separated by comma character: ","
        record - the Record object
        true - if update succeed otherwise false

      • update

        Update record with default primary key. 
         Example:
 DbPro.use().update("user", record);

      • batch

        public int[] batch(java.lang.String sql,
                   java.lang.Object[][] paras,
                   int batchSize)
        Execute a batch of SQL INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE queries. 
         Example:
 String sql = "insert into user(name, cash) values(?, ?)";
 int[] result = DbPro.use().batch("myConfig", sql, new Object[][]{{"James", 888}, {"zhanjin", 888}});
        パラメータ:
        sql - The SQL to execute.
        paras - An array of query replacement parameters. Each row in this array is one set of batch replacement values.
        戻り値:
        The number of rows updated per statement

      • batch

        public int[] batch(java.lang.String sql,
                   java.lang.String columns,
                   java.util.List modelOrRecordList,
                   int batchSize)
        Execute a batch of SQL INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE queries. 
         Example:
 String sql = "insert into user(name, cash) values(?, ?)";
 int[] result = DbPro.use().batch("myConfig", sql, "name, cash", modelList, 500);
        パラメータ:
        sql - The SQL to execute.
        columns - the columns need be processed by sql.
        modelOrRecordList - model or record object list.
        batchSize - batch size.
        戻り値:
        The number of rows updated per statement

      • batch

        public int[] batch(java.util.List<java.lang.String> sqlList,
                   int batchSize)
        Execute a batch of SQL INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE queries. 
         Example:
 int[] result = DbPro.use().batch("myConfig", sqlList, 500);
        パラメータ:
        sqlList - The SQL list to execute.
        batchSize - batch size.
        戻り値:
        The number of rows updated per statement
